raw_comment:
I noticed that younger people have more optimism then the older people
I wonder if its because of the experience and knowlege of the real world
This affects me because i am young and hopefull
"With age comes negativity"
ace_sentences: I noticed that younger people have more optimism than older people.
I wonder if younger people have more optimism because older people have more experience of the real world.
I wonder if younger people have more optimism because older people have more knowledge of the real world.
